## EntitlementInfo.unsubscribeDetectedAt property

The date an unsubscribe was detected. Can be `null`<!-- -->. Note: Entitlement may still be active even if user has unsubscribed. Check the [EntitlementInfo.isActive](./purchases-js.entitlementinfo.isactive.md) property.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly unsubscribeDetectedAt: Date | null;
```
